dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
T. Xiao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: CUHK03 is one of the largest benchmarks for person re-identification, containing 13164 images of 1360 identities captured by 6 surveillance cameras, with each identity observed by 2 disjoint camera views. The dataset provides both manually labelled and automatically detected pedestrian bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: CUHK03

dcterms:creator: D. Gray
S. Brennan
H. Tao
dcterms:description: VIPeR is one of the first benchmarks introduced for person re-identification, consisting of 1264 images of 632 subjects captured with 2 cameras. The dataset is known for its challenging nature due to the small training set size.
dcterms:title: VIPeR
